text: Georges Altman (21 May 1901 – 1960) was a French journalist and resistance fighter. During the Second World War he was involved in the Franc-Tireur organisation. Post-war, he was involved in setting up the left-wing party Rassemblement démocratique révolutionnaire. == Literary works == * An editor of "l'Humanité" * An editor of "le Monde" * An editor of "Le Progres" (1940-) * An editor of "La Lumière" (1940-) * An editor of the "Franc tireur" * Ça, c'est cinéma et le cinéma soviétique Category:French journalists Category:1901 births Category:1960 deaths Category:French male non-fiction writers Category:20th-century journalists
title: Georges Altman
